instructions: It is thanksgiving time I want to have something to drink before sleeping bring the cup from kitchen to the bed
I am hungry Is there a pineapple plush toy in the kitchen that you can bring to the office
Help me to put pink donut plush toy and pineapple plush toy from living room to kitchen
Let us have a tropical fruit party.Move the pineapple and avocado plush toys to the kitchen from the coffee table
Let us tidy up the family living room together ! Put the can and bottle from the office to the kitchen sink.
